language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (535, 0), size = (105, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 } Format:%d.%m.%YDefaultStartTimeEndTimeFormat:- %H:%MProgressExtendedDescriptionNextDescriptionNextNameNextDescriptionEvent1,noDurationEvent1,onlyDurationEvent2,noDurationEvent2,onlyDurationEvent3,noDurationEvent3,onlyDurationPrimeTime,noDurationPrimeTime,onlyDuration from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 25 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 10 if (640 > wsizex): wsizex = 640 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 25 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3))) Format:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultExtendedDescriptionFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultExtendedDescriptionFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultNameStartTimeFormat:(%A)StartTimeEndTimeFormat:- %H:%MProgressExtendedDescriptionFormat:%d.%m.%YDefault {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 10), size = (420, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 50 }
from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y())) DefaultFormat::%SNameIsMultichannelIsWidescreenBlinkVideoWidthVideoHeightPositionPositionLengthRemainingVideoWidth721,1980Format:%d.%m.%YDefaultDurationAsLengthExtendedDescriptionFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultDurationAsLengthExtendedDescriptionFormat:%d.%m.%YDefault {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (555, 24), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 30), size = (555, 60), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 100 } Format:%d.%m.%YDefault> Format:%d.%m.%YDefault> Format:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultNumberNameProviderDefaultFormat::%SFormat:%d.%m.%YBlinkStartTimeDefaultEndTimeDefaultNameRemainingInMinutesProgressStartTimeDefaultEndTimeDefaultNameDurationInMinutesRasInteractiveAvailableRadioTextFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultSNRdBSNRSNRAGCAGCBERBERLOCKLOCKInvertFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultTYPE0,0TYPE1,1TYPE2,2Format:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultBlinkNameFormat:%d.%m.%YDefaultFormat:%d.%m.%YDefault {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(size=(145, 20), text = 1, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(145,0), size=(145, 20), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 20 }
